I sometimes use flash of light, one problem I have found however, is that
they can still cast on you if they are blinded. I did not think this was
the case, but the one duel I lost was because a shaman friend of mine
nuked me hard while he was blind.

Hrm, my current stun does damage, around 74 I believe.


> look for you all he has to do is cast, unless of course he is being pounding
> from behind which puts them off.
Again, maybe I should of clarified, I didnt give my exact step by step
methods, but when I stun and move behind the caster, i'm right next to
them whacking away with my black mace.


> I would also suggest not to be hesitant to use divine aura quickly.
> Especially if rooted. One hope is that you can be aided by other players.
> Otherwise the general wiz technique is root and nuke. If they don't notice
> (or do not understand) they may waste a lot of manna.

I agree..


>

From people I have talked to, clerics are great in duels, I know a level
